name: Block Puzzle AR
description:
Stack up the blocks (tiles) correctly to clear lines!

◉ Play in Augmented Reality / AR anywhere
◉ AR tile matching arcade (blocks matching) puzzle game
◉ Incredibly simple yet extremely addictive game play
◉ Stunning 3D graphics and Beautiful graphics design
◉ Play in AR or in 3D mode
◉ Astonishing music and sound effects
◉ Truly immersive gaming experience
◉ Play for the high score, compete with others from all over the world on leader boards
◉ Amazingly simple controls - slide left/right to rotate, up to flip and down to stack

Give Block Puzzle AR a try, and see how well you stack up against your friends. Stacking blocks has never been so exciting!

TIP: Try to maintain the tower of blocks as small as possible.

Play Block Puzzle AR now in AR!
